title: Metadata
description: The Metadata summarizes key information about the following dataset. It includes a description of the dataset's content, a descriptive name or ID of the dataset, and the date of creation. It also lists the contributors, highlights the research areas which are covered and specifies the specific porous media model investigated. Descriptive keywords help categorize the dataset and the the hardware used in the experiment is also stored. Free flow conditions of the turbulent air flow are also stored. The Metadata provides detailed information about the measurements conducted in the experiment.

authors.title: authors
authors.description: Persons who worked on the dataset.

dataset_id.title: dataset_id
dataset_id.description: Descriptive name of the dataset or ID of the dataset.

date.title: date
date.description: Date & time when the dataset was created.

description.title: description
description.description: Summary of the content and background of the dataset described in 3-5 sentences.

devices.title: devices

free_flow.description: Free flow conditions during the experiment

Author.title: Author
Author.description: The Author section provides information about the persons involved in working on or creating the dataset.These information helps providing the identity and contact details of the authors associated with the dataset.

affiliation.title: affiliation
affiliation.description: Organisation to which the author belongs.

name.title: name
name.description: Full name of the author or the experimenter.

Calibration.title: Calibration
Calibration.description: The Calibration contains information about the parameters used during the recording process.The parameters are providing insights integero the camera position relative to the experiment for correcting possible misalignments.

calibration_image.title: calibration_image
calibration_image.description: The actual calibration image which was used.

calibration_type.title: calibration_type
calibration_type.description: Specify the calibration plate and/or the calibration facility which was used for calibration.

camera_position_rotation.title: camera_position_rotation
camera_position_rotation.description: Value of the rotation of the camera position relative to the calibration plate. (Â°)

camera_position_translation.title: camera_position_translation
camera_position_translation.description: Value of the translation of the camera position relative to the calibration plate. (m)

scale_factor.title: scale_factor
scale_factor.description: Value of the scale factor of the recordings.The amount of pixels corresponding to the length of 1 mm. (px/mm)

Camera.title: Camera
Camera.description: It specifies details about the camera lenses and sensors which were used during the experiment.

lens.title: lens
lens.description: Name of the camera lens which were used.

sensor.title: sensor
sensor.description: Description of the camera sensor which were used.

Device.title: Device
Device.description: The Device provides general information about the manufacturer and model of the used devices such as cameras, lasers, optics, triggering and seeding systems.

FlowParameters.title: FlowParameters
FlowParameters.description: The Flow Parameters encompasses crucial details about the flow parameters of the working fluid used in the present dataset. These parameters provide a comprehensive understanding of the fluid's properties and flow conditions within the experiment.

dynamic_viscosity.title: dynamic_viscosity
dynamic_viscosity.description: Value of the dynamic fluid viscosity (mPas)

fluid.title: fluid
fluid.description: Name of the free flow fluid (e.g. dry air, water, ...)

kinematic_viscosity.title: kinematic_viscosity
kinematic_viscosity.description: Value of the fluid kinematic viscosity (m^2/s)

mass_flux.title: mass_flux
mass_flux.description: Value of the fluid mass flux (kg/s)

pressure.title: pressure
pressure.description: Value of the fluid pressure at the outlet. (Pa)

reynolds_number.title: reynolds_number
reynolds_number.description: Value(s) of investigated channel Reynolds number(s). ( - )

temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: Value of the fluid temperature at the inlet. (K)

FreeFlow.title: FreeFlow
FreeFlow.description: The Free Flow section contains information about the shape, dimensions, and working fluid of the free flow channel.It provides details such as the shape of the flow channel's cross-section, the hydraulic diameter, height, width and depth of the channel and a description of the flow parameters of the working fluid.

depth.title: depth
depth.description: Value of the flow channel depth, assuming a rectangular channel. (m)

diameter.title: diameter
diameter.description: Value of the flow channel diameter, assuming a round channel. (m)

fluid.title: fluid
fluid.description: Description of the free flow parameters during the dataset.

height.title: height
height.description: Value of the channel height, assuming a rectangular channel. (m)

hydraulic_diameter.title: hydraulic_diameter
hydraulic_diameter.description: Value of the channel's hydraulic diameter (m)

shape.title: shape
shape.description: Shape of the flow channel's cross section (e.g. rectangular, round, ...)

width.title: width
width.description: Value of the flow channel width, assuming a rectangular channel. (m)

Hardware.title: Hardware
Hardware.description: The Hardware includes descriptions of the camera systems, laser systems, seeding devices and materials, optical devices, and triggering systems utilized during the experiment.

camera.title: camera
camera.description: Description of the used camera system.

laser.title: laser
laser.description: Description of the used laser system.

optics.title: optics
optics.description: Description of the used optical devices (e.g. laserarms, lenses, beamsplitter, sheet optics, ...).

seeding.title: seeding
seeding.description: Description of the used seeding device and seeding material.

triggering.title: triggering
triggering.description: Description of the used triggering devices.

Laser.title: Laser
Laser.description: The Laser provides information about the laser wavelength, either the laser is pulsed or continuous as well as the laser power.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the used laser (e.g. pulsed or continuous wave laser, ...)

wavelength.title: wavelength
wavelength.description: Value of the used wavelength of the laser. (nm)

Measurement.title: Measurement
Measurement.description: The Measurement encompasses key details about the conducted experiment and its calibration.

calibration.title: calibration
calibration.description: Calibration that has been done before the actual experiment.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the experiment.It should contain all relevant information about the experiment.

processing_steps.title: processing_steps
processing_steps.description: Processing steps and processed video data of the experiment

recordings.title: recordings
recordings.description: Recordings that have been done in the course of the experiment.

Model.title: Model
Model.description: The Model section contains information about the location of the object in the flow channel.It provides details regarding the type of the present porous media model, its location relative to the free flow and if applicable, detailed parameters related to the model which was used.

cad_model.title: cad_model
cad_model.description: CAD drawing of the used model (e.g. stored as a '.stl'-File)

location.title: location
location.description: Where is the object located inside the flow channel? (in, adjascent to, ... the free flow)

type.title: type
type.description: What kind of object is located inside the flow channel? (porous media model, cylinder, ...)

PorousMedia.title: PorousMedia
PorousMedia.description: The Porous Media contains information regarding the parameters associated with the utilized porous media model.They include the topology of the porous media model, the dimensions and other relevant material properties.

depth.title: depth
depth.description: Value of the porous media model depth. (m)

height.title: height
height.description: Value of the porous media model height. (m)

periodicity_x.title: periodicity_x
periodicity_x.description: Value of the porous media model periodicity in x-direction. (m)

periodicity_y.title: periodicity_y
periodicity_y.description: Value of the porous media model periodicity in y-direction. (m)

permeability.title: permeability
permeability.description: Value of the porous media model permeability. (m^2)

porosity.title: porosity
porosity.description: Value of the porous media model porosity. ( - )

topology.title: topology
topology.description: Definition of the porous media model topology.

wall_thickness.title: wall_thickness
wall_thickness.description: Value of the porous media model wall thickness. (m)

width.title: width
width.description: Value of the porous media model width. (m)

ProcessStep.title: ProcessStep
ProcessStep.description: The Process Step outlines the specific processing steps applied to the flow measurement video data.It includes the name of each processing step, the resulting video from the processing, and the software used to post-process the data.Additionally, files with the extension ".lvs" from the Davis 10 software can be embedded within this section, providing a comprehensive record of the processing workflow and ensuring the availability of relevant files for reference and replication.

name.title: name
name.description: Full name of the processing step.

operation_list.title: operation_list
operation_list.description: List of processing steps carried out with the processing software.

processed_recording.title: processed_recording
processed_recording.description: Resulting video after applying the process steps and the raw video.

software.title: software
software.description: Software that has been used to perform the processing steps.

Recording.title: Recording
Recording.description: The Recording contains crucial information about the parameters used during the recording process.These parameters offer valuable insights integero the experimental setup, facilitating accurate analysis and integererpretation of the recorded data. The inclusion of the video frames allows for a visual reference and further examination of the recorded footage.

field_of_view.title: field_of_view
field_of_view.description: Value of the field of view. (m x m)

frames.title: frames
frames.description: The actual Videoframes of the raw video

location.title: location
location.description: Specify the local filepath to the location of the recordings.

n_frames.title: n_frames
n_frames.description: Number of frames found in this video.

repetition_rate.title: repetition_rate
repetition_rate.description: Value of the recording repetition rate. (Hz)

time.title: time
time.description: Value of the investigated time period. (s)

Seeding.title: Seeding
Seeding.description: The Seeding describes the material of the seeding particles, the type of them as well as their density, particle size, and kinematic viscosity.

particles.title: particles
particles.description: Seeding parameters of the used seeding material during the experiment.

SeedingParameters.title: SeedingParameters
SeedingParameters.description: The Seeding Parameters contains crucial information about the seeding material used in the experiment.It includes details such as the material name, particle type, density, particle size and the kinematic viscosity of the seeding particles.These parameters provide valuable insights integero the characteristics of the seeding material and its influence on the fluid flow behavior within the experimental setup.

density.title: density
density.description: Value of the seeding particle density. (kg/m^3)

kinematic_viscosity.title: kinematic_viscosity
kinematic_viscosity.description: Value of the seeding particle kinematic viscosity (m^2/s)

particle_size.title: particle_size
particle_size.description: Value or span of the seeding particle diameter. (m)

phase.title: phase
phase.description: Phase of the seeding material which was used (e.g. solid, liquid, ...).

Software.title: Software
Software.description: The Software section serves as a container for general information about the software utilized in the experiment.It includes details such as the name of the manufacturer, the specific software name, and the version used to generate the dataset.These details provide important context for the experiment, allowing for reproducibility and facilitating a clear understanding of the software environment in which the data analysis and processing were performed.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Name of the used recording or processing software manufacturer.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the used recording or processing software.

version.title: version
version.description: Version of the used recording or processing software.

Triggering.title: Triggering
Triggering.description: The Triggering explains the recording mode employed during the experiment.

recording_mode.title: recording_mode
recording_mode.description: Type of recording mode during the experiment (e.g. time-based, cyclic time-based, ...).
